page.title: 13FARM MACHINERY
page.content:
The machinery on one farm within the area was counted as being typical of that used on farms throughout the area. There were:-
3 Tractors, a Landrover, a combine harvester, a forage harvester, 2 mowing machines, a haybob, trailers a buckrake, a plough, a disc harrow, a corn drill, a fertiliser drill, a front loader with fork, a bucket pallet fork, a cultivator, a slurry tanker, a mulch spreader, a post hammer and a barley brusher.
Milking equipment included a six-stall abreast-type parlour, and 2 bulk tanks with washers and a water heater.
